overview: A Xiang and his friends plan to spend the last boring summer vacation in the fishing port by repairing the boat and going to sea. After the summer vacation, Ah Xiang will go to Shanghai to go to university. Lan Lan, the girl Ah Xiang had a crush on, suddenly became popular on the Internet and went to the city. The matter of going to sea is put on hold, and love faces premature death.
title: Summer travel
